name: present_tense
continuous: I am currently writing a report.
perfect: I have completed my tasks for the day.
perfect_continuous: I have been working on this project for weeks.

name: past_tense
simple: Yesterday, I wrote a detailed email.
continuous: During the meeting, I was discussing the project progress.
perfect: By the time I arrived, they had already finished the presentation.
perfect_continuous: Before the event, they had been rehearsing their performance.

name: future_tense
simple: Tomorrow, I will submit the final report.
continuous: Next week, I will be attending a conference.
perfect: By this time next year, I will have completed my certification.
perfect_continuous: In five years, I will have been working in this industry for a decade.

name: noun
definition: A word that represents a person, place, thing, or idea.

name: pronoun
definition: A word used to replace a noun to avoid repetition.
example: She is going to the park.

name: verb
definition: A word that expresses an action, occurrence, or state of being.
example: They are singing in the choir.

name: adjective
definition: A word that describes or modifies a noun.

name: adverb
definition: A word that modifies a verb, adjective, or other adverb, indicating time, manner, place, etc.

name: preposition
definition: A word that shows the relationship of a noun or pronoun to another word.
example: The book is on the table.

name: conjunction
definition: A word that connects words, phrases, or clauses.
example: She likes both chocolate and vanilla ice cream.

name: interjection
definition: A word or phrase used to express strong feeling or surprise.

name: male
definition: A gender identity that typically corresponds with being assigned male at birth.

name: female
definition: A gender identity that typically corresponds with being assigned female at birth.

name: non_binary
definition: A gender identity that doesn't exclusively align with male or female, often encompassing a range of identities.
example: They are an advocate for non-binary rights.

name: transgender
definition: A gender identity that differs from the sex assigned at birth, often transitioning to align with their true identity.
example: She is a transgender woman who advocates for inclusivity.
